titles.title: To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 111 North Adams Street in Tallahassee, Florida, as the 'William Stafford United States Courthouse'.
To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 111 North Adams Street in Tallahassee, Florida, as the 'William Stafford United States Courthouse'.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

bill.summary: Designates the U.S. courthouse located at 111 North Adams Street in Tallahassee, Florida, as the William Stafford United States Courthouse.
